page.title: 01HIGHBRIDGE-BRENTKNOLL - SOM.
page.content: CONTAINING THE EASTERN PART OF HIGHBRIDGE;CROSSED BY M5,A38.WITH JUNCTION 22 NEAR ITS CENTRE;WITH BRITISH RAIL LINE FROM BRISTOL TO EXETER PASSING FROM NORTH TO SOUTH;YET BEING 80% FARMLAND,THIS IS A MIXED AREA. HIGHBRIDGE FALLS INTO TWO BLOCKS. THIS BLOCK CONTAINS THE NEW INDUSTRIES ON THE WALROW ESTATE.HERE FACTORIES PROVIDE WORK FOR MANY LOCAL PEOPLE.JUST OFF THE MAIN STREET,CHURCH STREET,IS THE AREA'S LARGEST ENPLOYER PRODUCING BEDROOM AND OTHER FURNITURE. SINCE BEING OPENED,THE M5 TAKES MOST OF THE TRAFFIC WHICH FILTERED THROUGH HIGHBRIDGE ON THE A38. JUNCTION 22 ON THE M5 PROVIDES READY ACCESS TO BURNHAM-ON-SEA, WESTON-SUPER-MARE AND BRISTOL AIRPORT AS WELL AS CHEDDER.
